title: What is the mathematics language? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mathematics language is full of symbols. Equal to, not equal to, less than or equal to, greater than or equal to, lesser than, greater than, addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, exponentiation, extracting roots, factorials, negative numbers, positive numbers, zero, nCr (number of combinations), nPr (number of permutations), recurring decimals, terminating decimals, …..
